Plot: Brad Whitaker is a radio host trying to get his stepchildren to love him and call him Dad. But his plans turn upside down when their biological father, Dusty Mayron, returns.
Title: Daddy's Home
Actors: Will Ferrell, Mark Wahlberg, Linda Cardellini, Thomas Haden Church
Writer: Brian Burns (screenplay), Sean Anders (screenplay), John Morris (screenplay), Brian Burns (story)
